name: lioness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a female lion: Through the clouds of dust, we could see a prowling lioness quietly picking out her next kill. Lionesses hunting in groups have been found to be more successful than lionesses hunting alone.
More examplesFewer examplesBoth women have shown the fierce protectiveness and fighting instincts of mother lionesses. To the right, three lionesses and four cubs were feeding on a young zebra they must have killed just before dawn. The seven tigers, four tiger cubs, lion, and lioness will live out their remaining years at the sanctuary.
